email.to: giles@ist.psu.edu, pbt105@psu.edu, Jian Wu <jwu@astro.psu.edu>, shzheng@cse.psu.edu, pxt162@psu.edu, mxk479@cse.psu.edu, Mikelahiri@gmail.com, gsdas@cse.psu.edu, b.sumit@hotmail.com, jithendra@cse.psu.edu, szt5115@psu.edu, ccaragea@ist.psu.edu, jsanpedro@ist.psu.edu, shc5011@ist.psu.edu, hhchen@psu.edu, davidyuanhz@gmail.com, ssk164@psu.edu, jjansen@ist.psu.edu, pmitra@ist.psu.edu, enm123@psu.edu, siweiping@gmail.com, danny@psu.edu, juh177@psu.edu, pxj913@cse.psu.edu, dus212@psu.edu, nzz101@psu.edu, guz107@psu.edu, dwu@ist.psu.edu
email.subject: See you around ...

text.sentence: Hello guys,
I know you might not believe this since I have said it more than once in the last two years but this time it's for real..
I'm going back to Colombia this Friday.
It has been a pleasure to know and work with all of you I wish the best for you guys.
Keep in touch,
Hi Juan,
I can never express my thanks to you in words.
I'd like to wish you a very happy and prosperous future, and a peaceful life.
Had I been in SCE right now, I would have definitely given you a hug.
You are one of the best persons I have ever seen. :-)
But since it's not possible, I'm sending my hugs in this email. :-) :-) :-)
Dear Juan,
It is going to be tough to fill your shoes, hopefully you will be working with us
from Columbia. Thank you for all the help and guidance you have given us and we
will miss you.
Are we holding a going away meet sometime ?
Take care, have a good trip back,
text.signature: Pradeep : The chocolate basket will miss you too

text.sentence: Hi Juan,
Wish you success with all your future endeavors. We probably can't thank you enough for all the help you have been over the last few years.
If you have a bit of free time how about those who are around get together over dinner/lunch?
text.signature: Take care then, -Suj PS. Seems Pradeep is already eyeing Juan's share of candy! :O

text.sentence: I'm going to try and get back for Thursday.
Put lunch on your calendar's for Juan.
Is that ok Juan?
yes, I am ok with it :)

Hi:
There will be a going away luncheon for Juan tomorrow, Thursday.
Please meet at my office at 1 pm.
